animeTitle: Urban Master: I Am The Peak of Medicine And Martial Arts
otherNames: Urban Master: I Am The Peak of Medicine And Martial Arts, Urban Saint Hand: I am the peak of both medical and martial arts, 都市圣手：我即医武巅峰
synopsis: Seven years ago, the Lu family was assassinated and murdered. The once famous Lu family disappeared overnight. Seven years later, the only survivor, the male protagonist Lu Feng, returned from his studies. With the inheritance of both medicine and martial arts, he vowed to investigate. Let the people behind the scenes pay the price for what happened back then. So he changed his name to Su Zhen and started to fulfill his master’s instructions, gradually uncovering the truth about the Lu family tragedy. But what he didn’t expect was that the Lu family had more secrets than he expected. Ancient martial arts cultivators, immortal magic cultivators Each one came into his sight, and he grew up in the process of constantly defeating his opponents, and gradually understood the responsibilities he shouldered.
